<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Sea Devil Baron](/Monsters.aspx?ID=360)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Unlike in many cultures, the highest-ranking sea devils are expected not just to wade into battle alongside their brethren, but to actively lead the campaign.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/SeaDevil_SeaDevilBaron.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Sea Devil Baron](/Monsters.aspx?ID=360)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Mutant" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=229" />
<trait label="Sea Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=235" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 287</row>

**Perception** +13; darkvision, wavesense 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14); shark commune 150 feet

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Shark Commune** ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [telepathy](/Traits.aspx?ID=250)) The sea devil can communicate telepathically with sharks within range. It can communicate only simple concepts like “come,” “guard,” or “attack.”

**Items**
[Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) (2), [Longspear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=6)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 24 

**Fort** +16 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 95

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 35 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
longspear +17 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+11 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 1d6+8 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +17,
**Damage** 1d6+8 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +17 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d8+11 piercing

**Blood Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135)) **Requirements** The sea devil is not [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) or already in a frenzy. **Trigger** The sea devil deals bleed damage to a living creature. **Effect** The sea devil flies into a frenzy that lasts 1 minute. While frenzied, the sea devil gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls with its claws and jaws, gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls with its claws and jaws, gains 15 temporary HP until the end of the frenzy, and takes a -2 status penalty to AC. The sea devil can’t voluntarily stop its frenzy. After its frenzy, the sea devil is [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15).

**Bloodletting**   When the sea devil deals piercing or slashing damage, it also deals 1d4 persistent bleed damage if the target was [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) or if the attack was a critical hit.

**Hateful Tide** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135)) **Requirement** The sea devil baron is in a blood frenzy. **Effect** The sea devil baron unleashes a whirlwind of attacks against its foes, making a single melee Strike with its claws or jaws against each opponent within reach.

</column>
